jobs.name: KnightHacks
jobs.title: Hackathon Organizer
jobs.description: KnightHacks is a UCF RSO for software development, which hosts a yearly hackathon, also named KnightHacks. Consistently, our hackathons have pulled 700+ people, and reach almost 100 projects submitted. From my experience volunteering and participating in various hackathons, I was brought onto the team to organize KnightHacks VIII, which will be held in October of 2025.
bullets: Working with our directing team to utilize over $60,000 worth of event funding.
Constructing an environment that provides hundreds of student hackers deadline-limited programming experience.
Assisting in logistics for a target of 1000+ people attending the event.
Planning engaging events to combat development burnout and make KnightHacks truly memorable.

jobs.name: DenTraceX
jobs.title: Lead Developer, VP
jobs.description: DenTraceX is a Florida non-profit organization dedicated to collecting dental records of missing persons, in order to cross-reference them with unidentified remains. My main role as Lead Developer is the implementation of the entire organization's tech stack, such as our database, security, and client-facing webpages. While we are not active yet, we are targeting a launch by September 2025.
bullets: Assist in the incorporation and management of a non-profit organization focused on a public good.
Authoring a secure database from the ground up to make submitting and accessing data for medical examiners as accessible as possible.
Working with a team of diverse disciplines to process and handle sensitive medical information, such as outreach and design.

jobs.name: Publix Super Markets
jobs.title: Cashier
jobs.description: Working as a Cashier, I interact with hundreds of customers a day, making sure that their needs are met and that they are truly happy to shop at Publix. As my first job, it's where I built much of my soft skills and self-accountability.
bullets: Processing customer transactions efficiently while providing great service.
Able to adapt easily to changes in working condition/customer inflow.
Working as a team to ensure the completion of all daily tasks while keeping store operations running smoothly.
